mapper.select: select com.company_name, zim.zzim_selected, zim.zzim_no from company_info com, zzim zim where com.company_id=zim.zzim_selected and zim.zzim_select=#{zzim_select}
select port.user_id, zim.zzim_selected, zim.zzim_no from portfolio port, zzim zim where port.port_id=zim.zzim_selected and zim.zzim_select=#{zzim_select}
